name: Hell Broke
description:
You are sick of your job as a full-time devil. All you'd rather do is be just a regular accountant, living a normal life.

Changing your life and and breaking out of hell won't be easy. It will be a test full of challenges and pitfalls... Proceed with caution.

Hell Broke is an action platformer where you race to the top racing against lava that's just beneath your feet. Quick feet (or fingers) are a must.
